segment.source: Plan for Windows 10 deployment (Windows 10)
segment.target: Plan for Windows 10 deployment (Windows 10)

segment.source: Windows 10 provides new deployment capabilities, scenarios, and tools by building on technologies introduced in Windows 7, and Windows 8.1, while at the same time introducing new Windows as a service concepts to keep the operating system up to date.
segment.target: Windows 10 provides new deployment capabilities, scenarios, and tools by building on technologies introduced in Windows 7, and Windows 8.1, while at the same time introducing new Windows as a service concepts to keep the operating system up to date.

segment.source: Plan for Windows 10 deployment
segment.target: Plan for Windows 10 deployment

segment.source: Windows 10 provides new deployment capabilities, scenarios, and tools by building on technologies introduced in Windows 7, and Windows 8.1, while at the same time introducing new Windows as a service concepts to keep the operating system up to date.
segment.target: Windows 10 provides new deployment capabilities, scenarios, and tools by building on technologies introduced in Windows 7, and Windows 8.1, while at the same time introducing new Windows as a service concepts to keep the operating system up to date.

segment.source: Together, these changes require that you rethink the traditional deployment process.
segment.target: Together, these changes require that you rethink the traditional deployment process.

segment.source: In this section
segment.target: In this section

segment.source: Topic
segment.target: Topic

segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: Change history for Plan for Windows 10 deployment
segment.target: Change history for Plan for Windows 10 deployment

segment.source: This topic lists new and updated topics in the Plan for Windows 10 deployment documentation for Windows 10 and Windows 10 Mobile.
segment.target: This topic lists new and updated topics in the Plan for Windows 10 deployment documentation for Windows 10 and Windows 10 Mobile.

segment.source: Windows 10 servicing options
segment.target: Windows 10 servicing options

segment.source: Windows 10 provides a new model for organizations to deploy and upgrade Windows by providing updates to features and capabilities through a continual process.
segment.target: Windows 10 provides a new model for organizations to deploy and upgrade Windows by providing updates to features and capabilities through a continual process.

segment.source: Windows 10 deployment considerations
segment.target: Windows 10 deployment considerations

segment.source: There are new deployment options in Windows 10 that help you simplify the deployment process and automate migration of existing settings and applications.
segment.target: There are new deployment options in Windows 10 that help you simplify the deployment process and automate migration of existing settings and applications.

segment.source: Windows 10 compatibility
segment.target: Windows 10 compatibility

segment.source: Windows 10 will be compatible with most existing PC hardware; most devices running Windows 7, Windows 8, or Windows 8.1 will meet the requirements for Windows 10.
segment.target: Windows 10 will be compatible with most existing PC hardware; most devices running Windows 7, Windows 8, or Windows 8.1 will meet the requirements for Windows 10.

segment.source: Windows 10 infrastructure requirements
segment.target: Windows 10 infrastructure requirements

segment.source: There are specific infrastructure requirements to deploy and manage Windows 10 that should be in place prior to significant Windows 10 deployments within your organization.
segment.target: There are specific infrastructure requirements to deploy and manage Windows 10 that should be in place prior to significant Windows 10 deployments within your organization.

segment.source: Windows Update for Business
segment.target: Windows Update for Business

segment.source: Get an overview of how you can implement and deploy a Windows Update for Business solution and how to maintain enrolled systems.
segment.target: Get an overview of how you can implement and deploy a Windows Update for Business solution and how to maintain enrolled systems.

segment.source: Windows To Go: feature overview
segment.target: Windows To Go: feature overview

segment.source: Windows To Go is a feature in Windows 10 Enterprise and Windows 10 Education that enables the creation of a Windows To Go workspace that can be booted from a USB-connected external drive on PCs.
segment.target: Windows To Go is a feature in Windows 10 Enterprise and Windows 10 Education that enables the creation of a Windows To Go workspace that can be booted from a USB-connected external drive on PCs.

segment.source: Application Compatibility Toolkit (ACT) Technical Reference
segment.target: Application Compatibility Toolkit (ACT) Technical Reference

segment.source: The Microsoft® Application Compatibility Toolkit (ACT) helps you determine whether the applications, devices, and computers in your organization are compatible with versions of the Windows® operating system.
segment.target: The Microsoft® Application Compatibility Toolkit (ACT) helps you determine whether the applications, devices, and computers in your organization are compatible with versions of the Windows® operating system.
